body.name: SereneLife Portable Mini Washing Machine - Foldable Bucket Washer for Clothes Laundry Lightweight and Easy to Bring, Perfect for Use in Camping, Apartments, Dorms, and Business Trip (Black)
features: PORTABLE MINI WASHING MACHINE: SereneLife’s foldable and portable bucket type mini washing machine helps save water and electricity, perfect for small clothes, underwear, towels and other small items and can be brought to almost everywhere

SEMI AUTOMATIC CLEANING FUNCTION: Equipped with semi-automatic cleaning functions, this portable washing machine has high-rhythm vibration that can effectively remove dirt to your clothes! Comes with a power cord and automatic button

ON THE GO MACHINE: The mini washing machine is ideal to use and store, also comes with a hand carry and lid cover, perfect for use in campings, apartments, dorms and business trips. Also equipped with a one touch button control

SAVER AND CONVENIENT: With a motor speed of 2200 revolutions/minute and a wash capacity of 6.6 lbs, SereneLife's portable washing machine not only saves your clothes for speed cleaning but also frees up space in your homes thanks to its portability

MADE WITH PREMIUM MATERIALS: Made out of premium safe and non-toxic material, the portable mini washing machine ensures durable and long lasting usage. It is also energy saving and has a handle, hotwash and basket

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a wow
reviews.reviewText: This did everything and then some will we were on vacation

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is very misleading and disappointing. On the listing here it says the wash capacity is 6.6 lbs; however, in the instruction manual is says it is 2.2 lbs! So this is flat out deception. I haven’t even used it because the directions are useless. Here is an example “align the notches of the six card slots on the spin basket.” Ok, I get what a spin basket is, but what are “card slots”? That is never explained. There are extra plastic ring pieces that are also not explained; they just show a picture of them, and they show two but I have three, and there is no where that I can see that they should go. I don’t want to break something and then not be able to return it.Here is another example from the directions: “DO NOT use water to wash the case of the washing machine.” Two sentences later: “you can use wet wipes to wipe the case.” So… I can’t use water on my washing machine? But wet wipes are ok? I mean, I would assume water is more gentle that wet wipes. And wet wipes are also… wet, so… I don’t really understand that.There is also no explanation on how to actually wash the clothes, other than put the water and detergent in there with the clothes. I guess then I drain it; but how do they ever get rinsed? Do I then add more water? Do I run it at a different setting for a rinse?I tried calling the customer service number, but all that happens is there is a recording saying “welcome…dialing” and it just repeats that over and over.I am so disappointed. I’m going to have to return this because it is un-useable. I suspect it’s just vague so you break it and can’t return it. And the 6.6 wash capacity is a flat out lie. This is more cheap junk from Amazon. I should learn my lesson and stop buying things here. At least they have a decent return policy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Space saving clothing cleaner
reviews.reviewText: My mom has a very small apartment that does not allow room for a washer and dryer. But she really needs to at least be able to was undergarments in between laundry trips . This was the perfect option for her so she can wash a fewThings here and there and then hang fry.We love that it folds down and takes up very little space!! It can wash up to 6.6 pounds . It can hit wash and spin dry. It’s so easy to use and definitely worth the money especially in the colder months when it’s harder to get out! It comes with everything need including a drain hose. It has a carry handle for moving too. Great for convenience.
